typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as string,
		empname as string,
		city as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(col1 = substring({_col0_},1,5),
		col2 = substring({_col0_},6,10),
		col3 = substring({_col0_},16,1),
		col4 = substring({_col0_},17,8)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		col1,
		col2,
		col3,
		col4
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		DpId as string,
		DpName as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['Fixfiletransform.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
